text:
It's not totally clear to me what you're trying to achieve. Are you trying to add a drag and drop area to the new DnD editor (your 2nd photo)?

If it's helpful, drag and drop areas isn't currently supported in email templates: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-areas>

However, based on this <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/How-to-add-a-dnd-drag-and-drop-area-inside-an-email-template/m-p/577593> it looks like something is in the works as of a couple months ago.
